job.title: Sr. RF Design Engineer - Aerospace
job.description: If you are a Sr. RF Design Engineer with experience, please read on!What You Will Be DoingDesign, Prototyping and Validation of RF Subsystems from concept, analysis, part selection, PCB layout and board bring-upLink budget analysisPerform simulations using HFSS or AWR/ADSElectrical Engineering, Embedded Software developmentIf you have mixed-signal experience in Software-Defined Radios, this is a huge plus!What You Need for this PositionStrong understanding of RF fundamentalsPCB layout using Altium or other design software Link Budget Analysis RF Design Circuit Design PCB Layout PCB Design GPS Altium Simulation AWR/ADS HFSSSo, if you are a Sr. RF Design Engineer with experience, please apply today!Email Your Resume In Word ToLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:Richard.Marion@CyberCoders.comPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : RM2-1635332 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***Richard Marion - Recruiting Manager - CyberCodersApplicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
